personalInfo.name: Surender Gyanmote
personalInfo.title: Security Program Manager | Cloud Solutions, Database Architect
personalInfo.summary: 2+ decades of Oracle Database design, development, database, System Administration, Performance and Capacity, Database Architecture, Cloud Solutions Architecture, Oracle Engineered Systems Administration, Security advisor and Lead Program manager for application and tools security in Managed Cloud to support Risk Compliance and security teams, combined with 5+ years of Database architecture, design, development, and administration. Expert in hybrid database solutions integrating oracle RDBMS database for multiple customers.

experience.title: Technical Program Manager / Managed Cloud Services
experience.description: Led planning, migrations, cutovers, and go-lives of managed customers into Engineered Systems (Exadata, Exalogic, Exalytics, Super Cluster, ZFS). Provided OCI Tenancy Administration, Database/System administration, on-prem & OCI migrations, and supported Tier1 customers as SME during escalations/outages.
achievements: Led enablement of OCI AI Infrastructure and Disaster Recovery (FSDR) implementations
Supported 150+ customers as Performance Engineer on Oracle Databases and E-Business Suite
Drove sizing and capacity initiatives to migrate from legacy Dell to Intel-X servers
Supported 100+ Oracle Partners in Performance Labs on sizing, capacity, tuning, and best practices
Published whitepapers and deployment guides for Oracle Partners
Oracle Database administration and System (Linux and Solaris) administration for 200+ environments, 100+ customers
Led go-lives on Exadata, Exalogic, Exalytics, Super Cluster, and ZFS
Migrated 200+ environments from legacy to new platforms; led production capacity & performance operations

projects.title: Managed Cloud Services - Migrations
projects.description: As a technical lead, migrated 200+ customer environments from legacy to latest platform. Capacity and Performance team lead, managed oracle managed cloud customers production environments

projects.title: Oracle Performance Labs - Oracle Partner products
projects.description: Showcased and supported 100+ Oracle Partners products to be deployed in Oracle technologies including Oracle Databases and oracle E-business suite in Oracle HQ performance labs

certifications.name: OCI - Oracle Autonomous Database Cloud 2019 Specialist
OCI - Oracle Cloud Infrastructure 2019 Architect Associate
OCI - Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Architect Professional
Oracle Cloud Infrastructure 2024 AI Foundations Associate

awards: Excellence Award of IT team – HCL Hewlett Packard
